mapper.insert: insert into customer( id, password, name, telephone, orderPassword, date, approvalStatus, approvalKey, email) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{telephone}, #{orderPassword}, now(), 'false', #{approvalKey}, #{email})
mapper.sql: select id, password, name, memNo, telephone, orderPassword, date_format(date, '%y-%m-%d') as date from customer
